componentInstanceProperties.name: message
componentInstanceProperties.value: This is a Snapshot Quote, created as a reference for the customer’s previous contract(s). It reflects the original contract details before any upgrades or modifications. This quote is non-editable for sellers but can be updated by Sales Ops if needed.
